events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter from the Engineering hiring team has been assigned to assist you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and we are impressed with your background and technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the next steps in our hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM. Please prepare accordingly for the coding and system design questions.
